short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get cashback for shopping online with reBITme!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Earn cashback while shopping online with the reBITme Browser Extension!

The reBITme browser extension is here to remind you about the exciting opportunity to receive cashback on your purchases. When you visit a participating store, the extension will prompt you to activate the cashback, ensuring you never miss out on savings.

Keep an eye on the extension icon in the upper right corner of your browser. If the icon turns green, it means your cashback is activated. Simply make your purchases as usual, and your cashback will be automatically credited to your account. If the icon appears red, don't worry â€” just refresh the page and activate the cashback through the extension. You can conveniently check your balance status directly within the extension or in your personal account on the reBITme service.

We value our customers, and to enhance your experience with our service, we have developed a feature-rich tool:

Access all your favorite stores with ease. No need to visit the reBITme website. Activate cashback with just one click directly on the store's website.

Stay informed with notifications about funds being credited to your account, changes in cashback status, and other important updates from the service. All notifications are saved and easily accessible in the dedicated tab of the extension.

Be the first to discover the most lucrative promotions, sales, and discounts from various stores. Get even more value and enjoyment from your shopping experience with the reBITme cashback service.

Refer reBITme to your friends, and both of you will receive a bonus. The more friends you invite, the more you can earn together.

Join over 1,000,000 satisfied users who are already benefiting from the reBITme extension. Try it out and start earning cashback today!

Don't miss out on savings. Install the reBITme Browser Extension now!"
